text: Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa suji Ust. Va'dai Alloh taolo [dar mavridi qijomat] haq ast. Ust, ki ofarinisro oƣoz mekunad, on goh [pas az marg] onro ʙozmegardonad,to kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙa adolat podos dihad, kasone, ki kufr varzidand, ʙa sazoi onki kofir ʙudand, sarʙate az oʙi cuson va azoʙi dardnok [dar pes] dorand
